Description: Necklace (?) comprising a large number of blue glass bi-globular beads with a smaller number of cornelian beads and three green glass beads of the same shape; globular beads of amethyst (2) and green glass (2) are also present; there is a centrally strung calcite pendant; the string terminates at each end with a blue glass wedjat-eye and a mottled blue glass bead.
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
